Body:
Hey everyone! It's time for **Ludum Dare 49**!

With [the impossible event](/events/ludum-dare/48/) now behind us, it's time to start preparing for the future. We had some big news to announce back in August **([we're hiring](/events/ludum-dare/48/$233336/ludum-dare-is-hiring-a-senior-developer-in-canada))**, and there's more to follow in the coming days. Check out **[the news](/news)** for the latest.

Things to know about this event:

* This will be a [regular **Jam/Compo** event](/events/ludum-dare/rules)
* It's an October event, so it start 3 hours earlier than you might be used to. See the time above.
* **NEW**: The "Play and Rate" games period will be shorter! It'll end on Thursday October 21st, or just over 2 weeks after the event ends, _instead_ of the usual 3 weeks.

Body:
Hey everyone! It's the [**20th anniversary**](https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/$276398/celebrating-20-years-of-ludum-dare-on-april-1st) of Ludum Dare, and time for **Ludum Dare 50**!!

To kick off our 3rd decade, I'm excited to announce that Ludum Dare has a brand new format:

## **Extra**: the new _casual_ Ludum Dare
In addition to the **Jam** and **Compo**, you can now choose a 3rd option **"Extra"** when submitting.

* The Extra format is a modified Jam format
* There are no winners in the Extra format, but you still _give_ ratings and feedback, and _get_ ratings and feedback
  * **NOTE**: Extra ratings are unused. In the future they will let you compare against the Jam/Compo
* Extra format games are due on Results Day: **April 21st**, nearly 3 weeks later! Choose your own schedule!
* Again there are no winners in the Extra format, but you are incentivized to finish to get feedback with everyone else
* **IMPORTANT:** Please only use Jam, Compo, and Extra for finished games. Otherwise choose Unfinished.

There are many exciting ways to use Extra. You can read about them and the future of Extra [here](/events/ludum-dare/50/$276398/extra-the-new-casual-ludum-dare-format).


## Resources
  * :closed_book: **Rules**: Update coming soon! ([old rules](/events/ludum-dare/rules))

  * :tv: **Keynote**: [Reunion Special](https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/test-node/welcome-to-ludum-dare-50-get-started-here)

Body:
Hello everyone, and [welcome to **Ludum Dare 51**](/events/ludum-dare/51/$296587/welcome-to-ludum-dare-51)!!

The big new thing this time is [game uploading and embedding](/events/ludum-dare/51/$296587/uploading-and-embedding-games-on-ludum-dare)!

### **Extra** is back: the new _casual_ Ludum Dare
In addition to the **Jam** and **Compo**, you can now choose a 3rd option **"Extra"** when submitting.

* The Extra format is a modified Jam format
* There are no winners in the Extra format, but you still _give_ ratings and feedback, and _get_ ratings and feedback
  * **NOTE**: Extra ratings are unused. In the future they will let you compare against the Jam/Compo
* Extra format games are due on **October 21st**, three weeks after the start! Choose your own schedule!
* Again there are no winners in the Extra format, but you are incentivized to finish to get feedback with everyone else
* **IMPORTANT:** Please only use Jam, Compo, and Extra for finished games. Otherwise choose Unfinished.

There are many exciting ways to use Extra. You can read about them and the future of Extra [here](/events/ludum-dare/50/$276398/extra-the-new-casual-ludum-dare-format).


## Resources
  * :closed_book: **Rules**: ([old rules](/events/ludum-dare/rules)) (Updated rules page coming soon)
    * You can now opt-out of Theme (not required, but you have the option)
    * Please submit games built with AI art generators as Jam or Extra games, not Compo
    * See [the welcome post](/events/ludum-dare/51/$296587/welcome-to-ludum-dare-51) for more details
  * :ballot_box: **Themes**: [/51/theme](/events/ludum-dare/51/theme)
